main.welcome3: I created it to share my uploaded files permanently and safely without fear of being deleted.
main.welcome4: You can download the files you want to download from here.
main.welcome5: If you run into a problem,
main.welcome7: I can help you as soon as possible.
main.welcome8: Direct mail to me if you think I'm not fast enough

contact.name: Your name
contact.emailInfo: This email address will not share other people.
contact.messageInfo: Please, tell me how can i help you ?
contact.nameRequired: This place can not be blank.
contact.emailNotBlank: This place can not be blank.
contact.messageRequired: This place can not be blank.
contact.messageMinLength: This place minimum length must be 50.
contact.isSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully. I will contact you as soon as possible.
contact.isNotSuccess: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again.

notfound.message: Unfortunately, the page you are trying to enter or the link you want to download is not available. You can contact me if you want to share this problem. I will try to solve it as soon as possible.

notpermission.message: You are stuck in our safety net on the page you are trying to enter. You cannot view because the link you want to access is privileged. If you think this is a problem, please contact me.
